Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with TV, Safe,Sitting room, Fully equiped kitchen (refrigerator,tea and coffee kettle,oven,dining table & chairs,toaster,kitchenette,WC with shower,balcony/terrace. Facilities: Private parking, free access to the neighbor swimming pool, 50m. away.

Sited only a few meters from the 4 Km long beach of Acharavi, VA beach front apartments offer the opportunity of wonderful summer vacation in Corfu. Distances: Beach: 50m. Bus stop: 5 minutes Water sports: 500m. Town center: 350m. Nightlife: 500m. Super market: 3 minutes Tourist center: 300m. Restaurants / Bars: 100m. Taxi station: 5 minutes Pharmacy: 500m.
